name: AstroGame
description:
This is my first game ever. So proud of it. Even though it looks super basic, I can now say I built a video game.  I cannot wait until I become a pro at this.

This was assignment 5 - following the UFO tutorial, but integrating my own character and environment along with an extraterrestrial sound effect.

P.S. I did not understand the directions at all for the 7zip. I did download it but how no idea how to use it. My laptop allows me to simply compress files and folders anyways so I did so because it is so much easier than using a third party software for it.
